alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Gwinnett; Henry; Newton; Rockdale; Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 5:44PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rockdale, southern DeKalb, south central Gwinnett, northern Henry, west central Walton and northwestern Newton Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 543 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Snellville to Lakeview Estates to Arabia Mountain to Panthersville, and moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds 40 to 50 mph, pea sized hail, frequent lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Decatur, Conyers, Covington, Snellville, Avondale Estates, Oxford, Lithonia, Porterdale, Walnut Grove, Belvedere Park, Lakeview Estates, Candler-Mcafee, Georgia International Horse Park, Druid Hills, Mountain Park, Belmont, Arabia Mountain, Big Haynes Creek Park and Rosebud. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: DeKalb; Gwinnett; Henry; Newton; Rockdale; Walton
